attributes.action: Plant more trees for animals and place more recycling bins around the UK
attributes.background: We chop down trees for paper and other packaging then don’t recycle it. We need more reciting bins so we can reuse paper and save animals homes and sources of food.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about trees, animal habitats and making it easier for people to recycle paper and packaging, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There's already a petition about planting more trees:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229056

And there are already petitions about recycling of packaging, for example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232684

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236614

You're more likely to get action on these issues if you sign and share a single petition.
